statements: DELETE FROM cloud_resource_metrics WHERE service_name = 'web' AND cpu_usage > 80;
DELETE FROM cloud_resource_metrics WHERE cpu_usage > 80 AND memory_usage > 80;
DELETE FROM cloud_resource_metrics WHERE service_name = 'web' AND (cpu_usage < 50 OR memory_usage < 50);
DELETE FROM cloud_resource_metrics WHERE disk_usage < 10 AND network_traffic > 1000;
DELETE FROM resource_usage_metrics WHERE cpu_usage > 80 AND memory_usage > 70;
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE latency < 50 OR error_rate > 0.1;
DELETE FROM resource_usage_metrics r JOIN performance_metrics p ON r.instance_id = p.service_id WHERE r.cpu_usage < 50 AND p.latency > 100;
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 week';
DELETE FROM network_traffic WHERE service_name = 'nginx' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM cloud_instances WHERE region = 'us-west-1' AND cpu_usage > 80;
